MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB470382419
Licensee Name: Family & Community Services Inc
Licensee Address: Suite 110
42140 Van Dyke Ave
Sterling Heights, MI 48317
Licensee Telephone #: (330) 297-7027
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Jennifer Vasilovski, Designee
Name of Facility: Family and Community Services-Livingston
Facility Address: Suite 116
3075 E. Grand River Ave.
Howell, MI 48843
Facility Telephone #: (586) 726-2988
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency has expanded and requested approval to include a satellite office at
411 West Lake Lansing Road, East Lansing, Michigan - Suite 125A.
III. Methodology
The on-site inspection of the new space was completed on 02/02/2018.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The office space was reviewed and consisted of one large communal office area
with multiple desks for the employees, dedicated visitation space,
meeting/conference room and storage space. There was locked storage available
for confidential information and a crosscut shredder for disposal of confidential
information. The space is suitable to the purposes of the agency. It is expected
that the agency will provide supervision, on-site, at least 2 days per week, as
required in the CPA licensing rules.
V. Recommendation
I recommend no change to the current license status.
February 16, 2018
________________________________________
Kari Muntean Date
Licensing Consultant
